mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_email, me_address, me_phoneNum, me_name, me_ms_state) values(#{member.me_id},#{member.me_pw},#{member.me_email},#{member.me_address},#{member.me_phoneNum},#{member.me_name},#{member.me_ms_state})
mapper.update: update member set me_ms_state = "회원" where me_ms_state = "가입요청"
update member set me_ms_state = "회원" where me_id = #{me_id}
